# we-switch-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property               | Attribute                | Description                                            | Type  | Default     |
| ---------------------- | ------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------ | ----- | ----------- |
| `changeSwitchCallback` | `change-switch-callback` | Function called when a switch inside change it's state | `any` | `undefined` |
| `name` _(required)_    | `name`                   | Name that identify this switch group                   | `any` | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                | Description                                       |
| ------------------- | ------------------------------------------------- |
| `--align-items`     | Align items of chips group <br> Default: unset    |
| `--display`         | Display of chips group <br> Default: flex         |
| `--justify-content` | Justify content of chips grou <br> Default: unset |
